definition: to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海滨救生员通常用旗号传达信息。

sentences.english: The marketing strategy of Taobao makes it easy for customers to know the brand information.
sentences.chinese: 淘宝网的营销活动向目标受众准确传达了品牌信息。

sentences.english: It ignores one’s audience and waters down your message.
sentences.chinese: 它忽视了听众，也把要传达的信息大大冲淡。

sentences.english: Make sure this order is brought to the attention of all IDF soldiers".
sentences.chinese: 此令务必传达全体以色列国防军士兵。

sentences.english: The signs must contain a pictogram to convey the message, instead of relying solely on text.
sentences.chinese: 除文字外，这些警告标识应包含图形来传达警告信息。

sentences.english: The execution notice requires our company to assist the execution of the verdict.
sentences.chinese: 传达了协助执行通知书，要求我公司协助执行判决。

sentences.english: Another source of delays is miscommunication.
sentences.chinese: 延迟的另一个来源是错误传达。

sentences.english: This design not only remind the car theft, also convey environmental awareness.
sentences.chinese: 这个设计不仅提醒了盗车者，还传达了环保意识。

sentences.english: In a low-context culture , the words used by the speaker explicitly convey the speaker's message to the listener.
sentences.chinese: 在低语境文化中，讲话者详尽地向听众传达信息。

sentences.english: Good message to China. No more Arunachal visa drama now.
sentences.chinese: 给中国传达了很好的信息，别再搞阿邦签证闹剧了。

sentences.english: Signage system is the media of information communication between people and urban space.
sentences.chinese: 导视系统是城市空间信息传达的手段和媒介。

sentences.english: You can email or text, romantically cute love quotes to your love mate to express your love gestures.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过邮件或短信，把浪漫情话传达给你的爱人。

sentences.english: The quartermaster rang up the order on the engine room telegraph.
sentences.chinese: 航信士官通过机舱令钟传达了命令。

sentences.english: President Obama’s message was evenhanded and diplomatic.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马传达的信息是非常公平且具有外交性的。

sentences.english: The simple and clean silhouette represents the adamancy and beauty of Geisha.
sentences.chinese: 以简练的线条传达艺伎的坚强与美丽。

sentences.english: He can convey the force of personality, the charm and the charisma.
sentences.chinese: 他能传达出曼德拉的人格魅力和感召力。

definition: to transmit/to pass on to sb else/(math.) transitive
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to assign/to entrust (a task)/to give/to bestow
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
